mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) OVER() AS CNT ,SEQ_ID ,(SELECT NAME FROM ITSM_COM_USER_INFO WHERE SEQ_ID = ICUI_SEQ_ID) AS USER_NAME ,TITLE ,HIT_COUNT ,LAST_UPDATE_BY ,TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH24:MI') AS LAST_UPDATE_DATE ,CASE WHEN SYSDATE >= LAST_UPDATE_DATE + 7 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS NEW_IMG FROM ITSM_IS_BBS_INFO IIBI WHERE 1 = 1 AND ROWNUM < 4 ORDER BY LAST_UPDATE_DATE DESC

SELECT SEQ_ID ,ICUI_SEQ_ID ,(SELECT NAME FROM ITSM_COM_USER_INFO WHERE SEQ_ID = ICUI_SEQ_ID) AS USER_NAME ,TITLE ,CONTENTS ,TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI') AS LAST_UPDATE_DATE FROM ITSM_IS_BBS_INFO WHERE SEQ_ID = #{p_seq_id}
